subject: Career
title: Deep Work in a Distracted Home
description: Learn Deep Work in a Distracted Home in one minute.

hook.text: Cal Newport's research: the average knowledge worker is interrupted every 11 minutes. At home, it may be more.

buildup.text: Deep work is focused, uninterrupted cognitive effort on demanding tasks. It produces your best output.

discovery.text: It takes 23 minutes to regain focus after an interruption. Three interruptions kill an entire morning.

twist.text: Remote work can enable more deep work than offices â€” if you protect it. No commute means more focus hours.

climax.text: Block 2-4 hours daily for deep work. Close Slack. Silence phone. Protect it like a meeting with the CEO.

punchline.text: Deep work is your unfair advantage. Guard it fiercely.

quiz.question: How long does it take to regain focus after an interruption?
